verses.verse: מִזְמ֗וֹר <S%H4210><s%> A Psalm לְאָ֫סָ֥ף <S%H623><s%> of Asaph אַ֤ךְ <S%H389><s%> Surely ט֭וֹב <S%H2896><s%> [is] good לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֥ל <S%H3478><s%> to Israel אֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> Truly God לְבָרֵ֥י <S%H1249><s%> [even] to such as are of a clean לֵבָֽב׃ <S%H3824><s%> heart

וַאֲנִ֗י <S%H589><s%> I כִּ֭מְעַט <S%H4592><s%> were almost [נָטוּי כ] (נָטָ֣יוּ <S%H5186><s%> afternoon ק) רַגְלָ֑י <S%H7272><s%> But as for me my feet כְּ֝אַ֗יִן <S%H369><s%> had well nigh [שֻׁפְּכָה כ] (שֻׁפְּכ֥וּ <S%H8210><s%> cast ק) אֲשֻׁרָֽי׃ <S%H838><s%> my steps

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for קִ֭נֵּאתִי <S%H7065><s%> For I was envious בַּֽהוֹלְלִ֑ים <S%H1984><s%> at the foolish שְׁל֖וֹם <S%H7965><s%> the prosperity רְשָׁעִ֣ים <S%H7563><s%> of the wicked אֶרְאֶֽה׃ <S%H7200><s%> [when] I saw

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> For אֵ֖ין <S%H369><s%> there חַרְצֻבּ֥וֹת <S%H2784><s%> For [there are] no bands לְמוֹתָ֗ם <S%H4194><s%> in their death וּבָרִ֥יא <S%H1277><s%> [is] firm אוּלָֽם׃ <S%H193><s%> but their strength

בַּעֲמַ֣ל <S%H5999><s%> They [are] not in trouble אֱנ֣וֹשׁ <S%H582><s%> [as other] men אֵינֵ֑מוֹ <S%H369><s%> else וְעִם־ <S%H5973><s%> like אָ֝דָ֗ם <S%H120><s%> [other] men לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> Nor יְנֻגָּֽעוּ׃ <S%H5060><s%> neither are they plagued

לָ֭כֵן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore עֲנָקַ֣תְמוֹ <S%H6059><s%> compasseth them about as a chain גַאֲוָ֑ה <S%H1346><s%> Therefore pride יַעֲטָף־ <S%H5848><s%> covereth שִׁ֝֗ית <S%H7897><s%> them [as] a garment חָמָ֥ס <S%H2555><s%> violence לָֽמוֹ׃

יָ֭צָא <S%H3318><s%> stand out מֵחֵ֣לֶב <S%H2459><s%> with fatness עֵינֵ֑מוֹ <S%H5869><s%> Their eyes עָ֝בְר֗וּ <S%H5674><s%> they have more מַשְׂכִּיּ֥וֹת <S%H4906><s%> could wish לֵבָֽב׃ <S%H3824><s%> than heart

יָמִ֤יקוּ ׀ <S%H4167><s%> They are corrupt וִידַבְּר֣וּ <S%H1696><s%> and speak בְרָ֣ע <S%H7451><s%> wickedly עֹ֑שֶׁק <S%H6233><s%> [concerning] oppression מִמָּר֥וֹם <S%H4791><s%> loftily יְדַבֵּֽרוּ׃ <S%H1696><s%> they speak

שַׁתּ֣וּ <S%H8371><s%> They set בַשָּׁמַ֣יִם <S%H8064><s%> against the heavens פִּיהֶ֑ם <S%H6310><s%> their mouth וּ֝לְשׁוֹנָ֗ם <S%H3956><s%> and their tongue תִּֽהֲלַ֥ךְ <S%H1980><s%> walketh בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> through the earth

לָכֵ֤ן ׀ <S%H3651><s%> Therefore [יָשִׁיב כ] (יָשׁ֣וּב <S%H7725><s%> break ק) עַמּ֣וֹ <S%H5971><s%> Therefore his people הֲלֹ֑ם <S%H1988><s%> hither וּמֵ֥י <S%H4325><s%> and waters מָ֝לֵ֗א <S%H4392><s%> of a full יִמָּ֥צוּ <S%H4680><s%> [cup] are wrung out לָֽמוֹ׃

וְֽאָמְר֗וּ <S%H559><s%> And they say אֵיכָ֥ה <S%H349><s%> how יָדַֽע־ <S%H3045><s%> know אֵ֑ל <S%H410><s%> How doth God וְיֵ֖שׁ <S%H3426><s%> ? and is there דֵּעָ֣ה <S%H1844><s%> knowledge בְעֶלְיֽוֹן׃ <S%H5945><s%> the Most

הִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> Behold אֵ֥לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these רְשָׁעִ֑ים <S%H7563><s%> Behold these [are] the ungodly וְשַׁלְוֵ֥י <S%H7961><s%> who prosper ע֝וֹלָ֗ם <S%H5769><s%> in the world הִשְׂגּוּ־ <S%H7685><s%> they increase חָֽיִל׃ <S%H2428><s%> [in] riches

אַךְ־ <S%H389><s%> Surely רִ֭יק <S%H7385><s%> [in] vain זִכִּ֣יתִי <S%H2135><s%> Verily I have cleansed לְבָבִ֑י <S%H3824><s%> my heart וָאֶרְחַ֖ץ <S%H7364><s%> and washed בְּנִקָּי֣וֹן <S%H5356><s%> in innocency כַּפָּֽי׃ <S%H3709><s%> my hands

וָאֱהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> become נָ֭גוּעַ <S%H5060><s%> long have I been plagued כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַיּ֑וֹם <S%H3117><s%> For all the day וְ֝תוֹכַחְתִּ֗י <S%H8433><s%> and chastened לַבְּקָרִֽים׃ <S%H1242><s%> every morning

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If אָ֭מַרְתִּי <S%H559><s%> If I say אֲסַפְּרָ֥ה <S%H5608><s%> I will speak כְמ֑וֹ <S%H3644><s%> thus הִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold ד֭וֹר <S%H1755><s%> [against] the generation בָּנֶ֣יךָ <S%H1121><s%> of thy children בָגָֽדְתִּי׃ <S%H898><s%> behold I should offend

וָֽ֭אֲחַשְּׁבָה <S%H2803><s%> When I thought לָדַ֣עַת <S%H3045><s%> to know זֹ֑את <S%H2063><s%> it was עָמָ֖ל <S%H5999><s%> this it [was] too painful [הִיא כ] (ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> he ק) בְעֵינָֽי׃ <S%H5869><s%> for me

עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> Until אָ֭בוֹא <S%H935><s%> Until I went אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into מִקְדְּשֵׁי־ <S%H4720><s%> into the sanctuary אֵ֑ל <S%H410><s%> of God אָ֝בִ֗ינָה <S%H995><s%> [then] understood לְאַחֲרִיתָֽם׃ <S%H319><s%> I their end

אַ֣ךְ <S%H389><s%> Surely בַּ֭חֲלָקוֹת <S%H2513><s%> them in slippery places תָּשִׁ֣ית <S%H7896><s%> Surely thou didst set לָ֑מוֹ הִ֝פַּלְתָּ֗ם <S%H5307><s%> thou castedst them down לְמַשּׁוּאֽוֹת׃ <S%H4876><s%> into destruction

אֵ֤יךְ <S%H349><s%> How הָי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> become לְשַׁמָּ֣ה <S%H8047><s%> How are they [brought] into desolation כְרָ֑גַע <S%H7281><s%> as in a moment סָ֥פוּ <S%H5486><s%> they are utterly תַ֝֗מּוּ <S%H8552><s%> consumed מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> by בַּלָּהֽוֹת׃ <S%H1091><s%> with terrors

כַּחֲל֥וֹם <S%H2472><s%> As a dream מֵהָקִ֑יץ <S%H6974><s%> when [one] awaketh אֲ֝דֹנָי <S%H136><s%> [so] O Lord בָּעִ֤יר ׀ <S%H5782><s%> when thou awakest צַלְמָ֬ם <S%H6754><s%> their image תִּבְזֶֽה׃ <S%H959><s%> thou shalt despise
כִּ֭י <S%H3588><s%> When יִתְחַמֵּ֣ץ <S%H2556><s%> was grieved לְבָבִ֑י <S%H3824><s%> Thus my heart וְ֝כִלְיוֹתַ֗י <S%H3629><s%> in my reins אֶשְׁתּוֹנָֽן׃ <S%H8150><s%> and I was pricked

וַאֲנִי־ <S%H589><s%> I בַ֭עַר <S%H1198><s%> So foolish וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> I אֵדָ֑ע <S%H3045><s%> [was] I and ignorant בְּ֝הֵמ֗וֹת <S%H929><s%> I was [as] a beast הָיִ֥יתִי <S%H1961><s%> become עִמָּֽךְ׃ <S%H5973><s%> before

וַאֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I am תָמִ֣יד <S%H8548><s%> Nevertheless I [am] continually עִמָּ֑ךְ <S%H5973><s%> You אָ֝חַ֗זְתָּ <S%H270><s%> with thee thou hast holden בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> hand יְמִינִֽי׃ <S%H3225><s%> [me] by my right
בַּעֲצָתְךָ֥ <S%H6098><s%> me with thy counsel תַנְחֵ֑נִי <S%H5148><s%> Thou shalt guide וְ֝אַחַ֗ר <S%H310><s%> and afterward כָּב֥וֹד <S%H3519><s%> me [to] glory תִּקָּחֵֽנִי׃ <S%H3947><s%> receive

מִי־ <S%H4310><s%> Whom לִ֥י בַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <S%H8064><s%> Whom have I in heaven וְ֝עִמְּךָ֗ <S%H5973><s%> and besides לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> nothing חָפַ֥צְתִּי <S%H2654><s%> [that] I desire בָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> [but thee]? and [there is] none upon earth

כָּלָ֥ה <S%H3615><s%> faileth שְׁאֵרִ֗י <S%H7607><s%> My flesh וּלְבָ֫בִ֥י <S%H3824><s%> and my heart צוּר־ <S%H6697><s%> [is] the strength לְבָבִ֥י <S%H3824><s%> of my heart וְחֶלְקִ֗י <S%H2506><s%> and my portion אֱלֹהִ֥ים <S%H430><s%> [but] God לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> for ever

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For הִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> behold רְחֵקֶ֣יךָ <S%H7369><s%> For lo they that are far יֹאבֵ֑דוּ <S%H6><s%> from thee shall perish הִ֝צְמַ֗תָּה <S%H6789><s%> thou hast destroyed כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all זוֹנֶ֥ה <S%H2181><s%> all them that go a whoring מִמֶּֽךָּ׃ <S%H4480><s%> at

וַאֲנִ֤י ׀ <S%H589><s%> But קִֽרֲבַ֥ת <S%H7132><s%> for me to draw near אֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> to God לִ֫י־ ט֥וֹב <S%H2896><s%> [it is] good שַׁתִּ֤י ׀ <S%H7896><s%> I have put בַּאדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> in the Lord יְהֹוִ֣ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD מַחְסִ֑י <S%H4268><s%> my trust לְ֝סַפֵּ֗ר <S%H5608><s%> that I may declare כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all מַלְאֲכוֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H4399><s%> all thy works
